column1: '''''A Fan's Guide to Neo-Sindarin: A Textbook for the Elvish of Middle-earth''''' is a 2017 book by linguist [[Fiona Jallings]]. Jallings' text presents an iteration of [[Neo-Sindarin]] that, as of 2017, incorporates all information available from sources such as ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'' and ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]''.
